name: Drill Dive
description:
Drill into the depths of the earth in this short puzzle game.

Mine your way through as you pave the way to gemstones. But plan carefully, you only have a limited amount of fuel.

Presented in a retro pixel art style, enjoy this simple puzzle game with 9 levels that calls you to make every move count and on your way to the goal.

Features:

Fuel tank with a limited amount

Puzzles that require you to manage your movement

Gather gems

Controls:

WASD for movement

R to restart
